channel.title: Hexchat doesnt open clickable links inside TBB
channel.description:
if there is a link inside IRC chat and clicked on it , it doesnt open in the browser and user needs to copy/paste into the browser.
is this Hexchat or TBB issue ? (i think most likely hexchat)

item.title: Hexchat doesnt open clickable links inside TBB
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Itâ€™s not easy to fix that and to keep the apparmor profile secure. Technical background:

https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=951331#23

Whonix AppArmor Profiles Development Discussion AppArmor
https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=951331#23

For better security, I recommend a manual process.

  1. Do not click links in HexChat (or any other application)
  2. copy/paste links into a text file to see what you actually copied
  3. and then if that looks good, copy the link into a browser.

Read full topic
item.source: Hexchat doesnt open clickable links inside TBB
